description:
When popping your boat on your roof rack, this strap kit helps you cinch it in place without having to remember the difference between a bowline and a water knot.

  • Stainless steel hooks are strong and stand up well to the occasional dunk in the ocean
  • Aluminum buckles have been nickel plated to protect it against salt water
  • Reinforced stitching inspires confidence
  • Burley polyester webbing dries quickly
  • Mesh ditty bag stores the straps buckles and hooks
  • Note – 2 of these straps are required to secure both bow and stern
name: Level Six V-Strap Transportation Straps
